item.title: Factory Pattern
item.description: Factory pattern or Factory Method Pattern is one of the most basic and most used design patterns in OOP languages. This is a creational type pattern and this pattern provides one of the best ways to create different objects without exposing the creation logic and exposing it using a common interface. To make it easier to understand, think of a car factory. The car factory produces multiple car types, but you don’t know exactly how the cars are produced, how much of the underlying technology and components they share, but you don’t care about that.

item.title: How to host your site on Github for free!
item.description: I’ve decided to start a blog and what better hello world post than how I’ve set it up. But first lets talk about what is Hugo. What is Hugo? 2560px-Logo_of_Hugo_the_static_website_generator.svg.png According to their site Hugo is a fast and modern static site generator written in Go, and designed to make website creation fun again. Put it in layman terms Hugo is a tool that generates a full static HTML website based on raw data and a set of templates.
